On Apr 12, 2007, at 6:26 PM, Jason Gauci wrote:

> Running the sequence a second time gives:
>
> Input: 1.0
> H0: 2.0
> H1: 1.0
> O: 3.0
>
> Running the sequence a third time gives:
>
> Input: 1.0
> H0: 3.0  # <= error
> H1: 1.0
> O: 4.0

Jason, you've made an error on your third (and subsequent) run(s)..

  I = 1
H0 =  (I + H1) = (1+2) = 2
H1 =         I = 1
  O = (H0 + H1) = (2+1) = 3

And, sensibly, it repeats from there...  In this case, either update  
method (sorted-single or unsorted-iterative) should be identical.

--Steve
